measure.name: Add Insulation to Exterior Walls
measure.description: Add insulation to exterior wals, lowering heat loss and heat gain, which results in less energy used for heating and cooling.
measure.modeler_description: Add a layer of insulation of a specified R-Value (ft^2*h*R/Btu) to all air exposed exterior walls with the selected construction. Insulation layer will be Unfaced Polyurethane or Polyisocyanurate (https://bcl.nrel.gov/node/34449), with thickness adjusted to achieve the desired R-Value.
